name: RegexValidator_isValidTest
description: Unit tests for the isValid method of the RegexValidator class.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_NullValue
test_cases.description: Tests that a null value is considered invalid by the RegexValidator.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_ValidPattern
test_cases.description: Tests that a valid pattern is considered valid by the RegexValidator.

test_cases.name: testIsValid_InvalidPattern
test_cases.description: Tests that an invalid pattern is considered invalid by the RegexValidator.
